Nnamdi

I am a 22-year-old Full stack Web developer interested in enhancing my skills in order to become a Software Engineer, and Machine Learning Engineer. I started coding at 11 and a half years. I am great at problem solving, and skilled in the implementation of data structure and algorithms.

In my leisure, I have made some YouTube Videos which shows some of my knowledge and skills which can be located at youtube.com/@okpalan.

I have obtained verified certificates of achievements with Microsoft in building interactive prototypes using JavaScript ,and in designing a technical solution. I am making the most of my opportunities to become a software engineer and teaching others how to computer programs.
